origins.name: Cultist
origins.desc: Once your team loses 50% of their Health, Galio is summoned, slamming into the largest cluster of enemies and knocking them up. Galio's strength increases based on the total star level of all active Cultists.

origins.name: Divine
origins.desc: Upon attacking 6 times or dropping below 50% Health, Divine champions remove all crowd control and ascend, taking 45% reduced damage and dealing 45% bonus true damage for the duration.

origins.name: Dusk
origins.desc: Dusk champions increase all allies' Spell Power.

origins.name: Moonlight
origins.desc: At the start of combat, a number of Moonlight Champions star up once until combat ends. (Prioritizes the lowest star-level champions. If tied, champions with the most items are chosen.)

origins.name: Elderwood
origins.desc: Every two seconds all Elderwood champions grow, gaining bonus stats. This effect stacks up to five times.

origins.name: Exile
origins.desc: If an Exile has no adjacent allies at the start of combat, they gain:

origins.name: Ninja
origins.desc: Ninjas gain bonus Attack Damage and Spell Power. This trait is only active when you have exactly 1 or 4 unique Ninjas.

origins.name: Spirit
origins.desc: The first time a Spirit casts their spell, all allies gain Attack Speed based on the spell's mana cost.

origins.name: Warlord
origins.desc: Warlords have bonus Health and Spell Power. Each victorious combat they participate in increases the bonus by 10%, stacking up to 5 times.

classes.name: Duelist
classes.desc: Innate: Duelists gain bonus Movement Speed. Duelists' attacks grant Attack Speed, up to 8 stacks.

classes.name: Hunter
classes.desc: Every few seconds, all Hunters will attack the lowest percent Health enemy, dealing bonus damage.

classes.name: Keeper
classes.desc: At the start of combat, Keepers grant themselves and all nearby allies a shield for a duration. This shield is 50% stronger on Keepers.

classes.name: Adept
classes.desc: Adepts calm the flow of battle, reducing the Attack Speed of all enemies by 50% for a few seconds at the start of combat.

classes.name: Assassin
classes.desc: Innate: At the start of combat, Assassins leap to the enemy backline. Assassins gain bonus Critical Strike Damage and Chance, and their spells can critically strike.

classes.name: Dazzler
classes.desc: Dazzlers' spells reduce the Attack Damage of enemies hit for 8 seconds.

classes.name: Mage
classes.desc: Mages cast twice and have modified Spell Power.

classes.name: Shade
classes.desc: Innate: When combat starts, Shades teleport to the enemy backline. After every 3 attacks Shades dip into the shadows, stealthing and causing their next basic attack to deal bonus magic damage.

classes.name: Sharpshooter
classes.desc: Sharpshooters attacks and spells ricochet to nearby enemies dealing reduced damage.
